name: Storage Count & Capacity Check
description: Validates that the system has at least a minimum number of eligible storage disks and that each eligible disk meets a minimum capacity requirement.

parameters.name: MinimumDiskCount
parameters.help: Minimum number of eligible storage disks required to be present.

parameters.name: MinimumDiskSizeGB
parameters.help: Minimum capacity (in GB) required for each eligible disk.

parameters.name: E_Scope
parameters.help: Disk scope to evaluate: internal (exclude typical removable/external bus types) or all (include all disks).

parameters.name: B_IgnoreVirtual
parameters.help: When true, exclude disks that appear to be virtual (to avoid counting software/virtual disks).
